com.thomasdiewald.liquidfun.java.render

Class DwParticleRender

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thomasdiewald.liquidfun.java.render.DwParticleRender
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DwParticleRenderGL, DwParticleRenderGLQuads, DwParticleRenderP5

    public abstract class DwParticleRender
extends Object
    Box2D/LiquidFun particles renderer.
    updates render-buffers: position, colors, velocity, contacts, etc...
    Author:
    Thomas Diewald
